name: The Woman
description:
The Woman is a 2.5D puzzle platform game in city named Zobeide which is based on the story from the book “Invisible Cities”. The character is a man who tries to pursue a mysterious woman who shows only her back with long-hair. 

During the journey, the player needs to reach all the flags as a record of the steps of the woman. The route is invisible and player needs to place the blocks as assistive tool to build up the city for lighting up all the flags. Eventually when the character reaches the end with all signs recorded, the truth of the woman will be revealed.

 Game by Xingwei Yu, DATT3300, lab1
